24 Hour Events:,   Originally planned to have HD cath replaced over a wire yesterday, but,   was delayed until today. As a result Pt off CVVH for a day,   Pt also planned to have A-line resited. The MICU team was unable to,   place it and anaesthesia was called. Placement of a new A-line is,   pending,   Vanco: 8.4, will need increased dosing,   All cultures negative so far,   Levophed dose was 0.08 for a while, but back up to 0.1mg/min once she,   was sleeping,   UOP 10-15mL/hr,   Surgery recommending chest tube to suction of -20cmH2O plus regular,   flushes of sterile NS. Following up with surgery on how to do these,   flushes.,

24 Hour Events:,   - Was off of Levophed for majority of yesterday .  Placed back on,   Levophed once MAPs were consistently <60.,   - IP- to see pt this am regarding flushing line, need for suction vs,   water seal, as well as next steps.  Also, requested non contrast chest,   CT to aid in further eval,   - Renal- advised repeat u/a, urine culture, and renal u/s.  However,,   given that we were obtaining a chest CT, expanded CT to included,   abd/pelvis.,   - Non contrast CT performed, unread,   - Endocrine- Increased Synthroid dose from 40mcg to 125 mcg.  Elev TSH,   and decr free T4 and T3.  Anti-TPO Ab pending,   - Art line- not resited yesterday due to question of small radial,   thrombus,   - HD cath- will be placed by IR per renal, most likely today,

Repleted mag with SS.,   [**Last Name (un) **] stim was done. results were 23.8->42.2.,   U/A large blood, mod bacteria, 100 prot, 3 WBCs. Culture pending.,
